name: IMAGE_TOOLS__DOWNLOAD_IMAGE
description: Downloads an image from a URL and saves it as an artifact. Includes file size limits and security checks to prevent downloading from internal services.

url.description: The URL of the image to download.

filename.description: The desired filename for the downloaded image (e.g., 'image.jpg'). If not provided, will be extracted from URL.

max_size_mb.description: Maximum file size in MB (default: 50MB for AI processing).

name: IMAGE_TOOLS__ANALYZE_IMAGE_WITH_LLM
description: Analyzes an image artifact using a multimodal LLM. Takes an artifact ID and a query, verifies the artifact is an image, then sends it to an AI vision model for analysis.

artifact_id.description: The ID of the artifact containing the image to analyze.

query.description: The query or prompt to send to the LLM along with the image (e.g., 'Describe this image in detail' or 'What objects can you see?').
